comment.author: 8868232@N02
comment._content: This church is no longer here, it was destroyed after Hurrican Hugo in 1989. All that remains is the steps and a pile of rubble,

comment.author: 50687597@N05
comment._content: WOW this is the Old Pilgrim Holiness Church building later rename Weslyan Holiness Church prior to its destruction by Hurrican Hugo in 1989. My family has been members of this body of believers for decades now......PEACE...........May Jesus Christ be Lord of All.
